sub_topic: Calculating the surface area of a sphere.
message_1: A sphere has a radius of 8 cm. Find its surface area.
message_2:
To find the surface area of a sphere, we use the formula:

Surface Area = 4πr²

where r is the radius of the sphere.

Given that the radius of the sphere is 8 cm, we can plug this value into the formula:

Surface Area = 4π(8²)

Surface Area = 4π(64)

Surface Area = 256π

The surface area of the sphere is 256π square centimeters.
